name: Super Basement Run
description:
A short game about avoiding ghosts and grabbing the gold!

Collect the target amount of gold in each level to open the trapdoor to the next floor down. Avoid bear traps, and try not to get stuck in those cobwebs!

This small game was made over the course of several hours and will only take a few minutes of your time. Average playtime: 3 to 15 minutes.
